text:
<!--2021m04d24-->
<$set name=cur_title filter=<<currentCard>> >
<$list variable=missing_tag filter="[prefix<cur_title>!tag<cur_title>]">
<$link to=<<missing_tag>> /> missing tag
</$list><!--missing_tag-->

<$list variable=filter_text filter="[<cur_title>split[Draft of ']join[]split[']join[]]">
<$list variable=cur_card filter="[tag<filter_text>!match<cur_title>!suffix[/base-install]sort[]]">

<$link to=<<cur_card>> />
</$list><!--cur_card-->
</$list><!--filter_text-->
</$set><!--cur_title-->
title: $:/positivesigner/div-pop

text: <$list variable=cur_card filter="[all[current]]"> <$button class=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/popup/DivPopTitle" text=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="pop_right"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/positivesigner/div-pop/DivPop.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Popup over Sidebar"/>
title: $:/positivesigner/div-pop/DivPop btn

text:
<$list variable=cur_divpop_card filter="[{$:/state/popup/DivPopTitle}is[tiddler]]">
<$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="no"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/popup/DivPopTitle" text=""/> close    <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" text="show"><$button set="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" setTo="hide">show   <$link to=<> ><> <$list variable=cur_text filter="[get[text]]"> <$codeblock code=<> /> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" text="show"><$button set="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" setTo="show">code   <$link to=<> ><> <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude mode="block" />
